title: 10 Commandments of Ranked LoL
body:
Thou shall not Troll
Thou shall not rage at thy Noob
Thou shall not go Afk or Leavith
Thou shall not Test New Builds or Champs
Thou shall not Blame others for thy OWN lane losing.
Thou shall Wards for thy Win
Thou shall Help Secure Dragons for thee greater good.
Thou shall realise Team work wins over thy individual skill.
Thou shall join in on team fights
Thou shall use ping effectively for Mia's, Dangers, and Assists

replies.body: your attempt as self justification shows how lame and silly this really is
You trying to act smart is pretty funny

Not only am i not spamming, this is the appropriate board. its 2 post. Why dont you guys just deal with it. If it gets taken down ill just put it up again. Until the msg has sunk into your tiny little troll brains
We are dealing with it, appropriately. How? Pointing out the rules of the boards and reporting you for spam.

lol ive read the rules. Your the only reason these comments continue. all i did was post something to try help make LoL oce better. and straight away you have all jumped down my throat about spamming and putting me and my post down. You keep trying to make these big posts about how I'm a troll and how I'm spamming. But look in the mirror mate. U have made more comments that anyone. Your spamming BS in my post. You also have not answered any questions I've asked

How is putting it up in 2 appropriate boards spamming?
Stop posting this. You just double posted it. Did the original post not get enough attention?

Spamming? its 2 posts. LOL thats not spamming muppet
It's 4 threads saying the exact same thing and in each of them you continually 'bump' it and act aggressively to anyone who doesn't agree with you or asks you to stop spamming so yes, it is spamming.
So called "spamming" aside, why don't you agree with the post? i dont get it
Because you claimed it was good when, in my opinion (and the opinions of a lot of board users), it was just a sh!t post and got pissed when I disagreed with you.
so what your saying is you like trolls and afks and ragers etc. you dont like warding or team work... yup, ur about as doosh bag as i thought u were
